metadata.title: CVE-2019-8586 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.3, macOS Mojave 10.14.5, tvOS 12.3,Safari 12.1.1, iTunes for Windows 12.9.5, iCloud for Windows 7.12.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk package in xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
